# Course Projects

**Statistics M254** | Spring 2024

-   [Cell Type Annotation in Single-Cell DNA-seq Data](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/Final_Project.html)

    -   In this project, I analyze two datasets: BoneMarrow and Pancreas and apply the [Seurat](https://satijalab.org/seurat/) package to identify cell types in single-cell DNA-seq data. I tune the parameters to optimize the clustering results and visualize the cell types using umap plots.
